title: The Hangover Part III
summary: The Hangover Part III (also known as The Hangover 3: The Rise of Marshall in the working title) is a 2013 American action comedy film and the sequel to The Hangover Part II (2011), produced by Legendary Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It is the third and final installment in The Hangover trilogy. The film stars Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Ken Jeong, Jeffrey Tambor, Heather Graham, Mike Epps, Melissa McCarthy, Justin Bartha, and John Goodman with Todd Phillips directing a screenplay written by himself and Craig Mazin.
